```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggpubr")
install.packages("janitor")
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(janitor)
```



```{r}
Indicator_Data <- read.csv(file = "Indicator_data.csv")
View(Indicator_Data)
Indicator_Data
```


```{r}
ID_tidy <- Indicator_Data %>%
  select(Indicator.Type..Column.Name., Physical, X, X.1, Biological.Indicators, X.2, X.3, X.4, X.5, X.6, X.7, X.8, X.9, Chemical) %>%
  row_to_names(row_number = 1)
  

ID_tidy <- ID_tidy[-c(10,11), ]
view(ID_tidy)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = , aes(x = , y = )) +
 geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.75) +
 labs(x = "\n Colour Choice", y = "Count \n", title = "Favourite Colours Survey Results \n") +
 theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), 
 axis.title.x = element_text(face="bold", colour="red", size = 12),
 axis.title.y = element_text(face="bold", colour="red", size = 12))
```
